entries.name: config
entries.desc: The CGI configuration.  This is based on WEBrick::Config::HTTP

entries.name: service(req, res)
entries.desc: Services the request req which will fill in the response res.  See WEBrick::HTTPServlet::AbstractServlet#service for details.

entries.name: start(env=ENV, stdin=$stdin, stdout=$stdout)
entries.desc: Starts the CGI process with the given environment env and standard input and output stdin and stdout.
